title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 466.3 - Mandatory use
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 466.3 - Mandatory use

State Regulations

Upon issuance of an administrative directive by OCFS
indicating that information regarding a child welfare service or services must
be entered into the CONNECTIONS system, each social services district or public
or private agency providing such service that has access to the CONNECTIONS
system must use the CONNECTIONS system for recording the information in the
form and manner prescribed by OCFS to satisfy the data requirements for the
particular service. Any such administrative directive may require use of the
CONNECTIONS system for all or part of the services or information to be
documented, and may apply initially to a limited number of social services
districts and/or public and private agencies. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
466.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
